name: Sanataro
body:
### Welcome to Sanataro
This simple web household account book application is built on Ruby on Rails and supports some kinds of DBMS.

### How to try...
```
$ cp config/database.yml.sample config/database.yml
$ vi config/database.yml
$ bundle install
$ rake db:setup
$ rake db:migrate
$ rails s
```

### DEMO
http://sanataro.heroku.com

### Ruby on Rails version
* 3.2.3

### Supported Ruby version
* MRI 1.9.2-p250
* MRI 1.9.3-p125
* JRuby 1.6.7 (1.9 mode)

### Supported DBMS
* MySQL5
* PostgreSQL
* SQLite3
